name: SpinningSmash!
description:
Spinning Smash

Douglas Massey

This is a fun and simple game, in which you use the arrow keys to rotate around a circle in the centre. You have to defend this circle by moving your character, the orange circle, to collide with incoming white orbs. You get three lives, and you lose a life whenever an orb hits the centre circle! The game will become more challenging, and the orbs will appear faster and faster, the longer you last. This is a Single Player game, which you can download on Mac OS, Windows, or Linux! Try it out right now in your browser, and comment your HIGH SCORE!
